quotes.quote: Aikido is not a technique to fight with or defeat an enemy. It is a way to reconcile the world and make human beings one family.

The Art of Peace begins with you. Work on yourself and your appointed task in the Art of Peace. Everyone has a spirit that can be refined, a body that can be trained in some manner, a suitable path to follow.
The secret of Aikido is to become one with the universe. By understanding ourselves, we can understand others.
True victory is self-victory; let that day arrive quickly!
The divine is not something high above us. It is in heaven, it is in earth, it is inside us.
In Aikido, we never attack. An attack is proof that one is out of control.
The purpose of training is to tighten up the slack, toughen the body, and polish the spirit.
When life is victorious, there is birth; when it is thwarted, there is death. A warrior is always engaged in a life-and-death struggle for Peace.
To injure an opponent is to injure yourself. To control aggression without inflicting injury is the Art of Peace.
All life is a manifestation of the spirit, the manifestation of love.
The Way of a Warrior is based on humanity, love, and sincerity; the heart of martial valor is true bravery, wisdom, love, and friendship.
The Art of Peace is the religion that is not a religion; it perfects and completes all religions.
The movements of the universe are an expression of the continuity of life.
Those who are skilled in combat do not become angered; those who are skilled at winning do not become afraid.
When an opponent comes forward, move in and greet him; if he wants to pull back, send him on his way.
The true meaning of the martial arts is to seek and understand the essence of the universe.
The Art of Peace is the principle of nonresistance. Because it is nonresistant, it is victorious from the beginning.
To control aggression without inflicting injury is the Art of Peace.
The ultimate goal of Aikido is to become one with the universe.
Your heart is full of fertile seeds, waiting to sprout.
When you bow deeply to the universe, it bows back; when you call out the name of God, it echoes inside you.
The spirit of Aikido is to cherish the spirit of loving protection for all things.
A mind to serve for the peace of all human beings in the world is needed in Aikido, and not the mind of one who wishes to be strong or who practices only to defeat an opponent.
The only way to stop aggression is to confront it. But if you do so with aggression in your own mind, it will grow and you yourself will be entangled in it.
The divine is something that shines in all things and is revealed in the harmony and diversity of the universe.
If your mind is empty, it is always ready for anything; it is open to everything. In the beginner's mind, there are many possibilities; in the expert's mind, there are few.
Aikido is not a way to fight with or defeat enemies; it is a way to reconcile the world and make all human beings one family.
It is not possible to control the outside of yourself until you have mastered your breathing space. It is not possible to change anything until you understand the substance you wish to change.
Heaven is right where you are standing.
quotes.author: Morihei Ueshiba

quotes.quote: Loyalty and devotion lead to bravery. Bravery leads to the spirit of self-sacrifice. The spirit of self-sacrifice creates trust in the power of love.
quotes.author: Morihei Ueshiba

quotes.quote: When you bow deeply to the universe, it bows back; when you call out the name of God, it echoes inside you.
quotes.author: Morihei Ueshiba

quotes.quote: Those who are enlightened never stop forging themselves.
quotes.author: Morihei Ueshiba

quotes.quote: Failure is the key to success; each mistake teaches us something.
quotes.author: Morihei Ueshiba

quotes.quote: Progress comes to those who train and train; reliance on secret techniques will get you nowhere. ~ Morihei Ueshiba
quotes.author: Morihei Ueshiba

quotes.quote: There are no contests in the Art of Peace. A true warrior is invincible because he or she contests with nothing. Defeat means to defeat the mind of contention that we harbor within.
quotes.author: Morihei Ueshiba

quotes.quote: Create each day anew.
quotes.author: Morihei Ueshiba

quotes.quote: Those who are skilled in combat do not become angered, those who are skilled at winning do not become afraid. Thus the wise win before the fight, while the ignorant fight to win. ~ Morihei Ueshiba
quotes.author: Morihei Ueshiba

quotes.quote: Failure is the key to success; each mistake teaches us something.
quotes.author: Morihei Ueshiba

quotes.quote: Life itself is always a trial. In training, you must test and polish yourself in order to face the great challenges of life. Transcend the realm of life and death, and then you will be able to make your way calmly and safely through any crisis that confronts you.
quotes.author: Morihei Ueshiba

quotes.quote: Your heart is full of fertile seeds, waiting to sprout.
quotes.author: Morihei Ueshiba

quotes.quote: Heaven is right where you are standing, and that is the place to train. --O-sensei Morihei Ueshiba
quotes.author: Morihei Ueshiba

quotes.quote: Now and again it is necessary to seclude yourself among deep mountains and hidden valleys to restore your link to the source of life. - Morihei Ueshiba, founder of Aikido
quotes.author: Morihei Ueshiba

quotes.quote: The Way of the Warrior has been misunderstood. It is not a means to kill and destroy others. Those who seek to compete and better one another are making a terrible mistake. To smash, injure, or destroy is the worst thing a human being can do. The real Way of a Warrior is to prevent such slaughter...
quotes.author: Morihei Ueshiba

quotes.quote: Heaven is right where you are standing.
quotes.author: Morihei Ueshiba

quotes.quote: Loyalty and devotion lead to bravery. Bravery leads to the spirit of self-sacrifice. The spirit of self-sacrifice creates trust in the power of love.
quotes.author: Morihei Ueshiba
